[NAME], did you know that there's a serious shortage of commercial pilots nationwide?

Both regional and national airlines are hiring pilots in numbers not seen in years.

Your interest in the AeroGuard Elite Flight Training Program couldn’t be timed any better.

  • “The U.S. will face a staggering shortage of pilots” – CNN.com
  • “U.S. pilot shortage reaching 'crisis'” – Grand Forks Herald

"Over the next two decades, 87 pilots will need to be trained and ready to fly a commercial airliner every day in order to meet our insatiable demand to travel by air. That's one every 15 minutes."

"In the next 20 years, airlines in North America are going to need 117,000 new pilots, Boeing estimates."
